message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exceptional opportunity that could significantly benefit your business. Considering its value, I propose a price of $900,000 for this exclusive item.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I recognize the value of your product, I believe a price of $600,000 would be more reasonable. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your perspective. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $750,000 for the product.
Alice, thanks for the movement on price. I'm getting closer to a point where I can make this work. How about we settle at $675,000?
I understand your position, Bob. In light of our previous discussions, I am prepared to offer the product at $725,000. This represents a fair compromise considering the value you place on it.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this. To be completely transparent, my budget ceiling is $700,000. If you're able to meet that, I'm ready to close the deal today.
